dcterms:creator: K. Barylska
A. Gogolinska
Ł. Mikulski
A. Philippou
M. Piątkowski
K. Psara
dcterms:description: A dataset containing models of reversible computations represented as Reversing Petri Nets (RPNs), which allow for the reversal of computations through various semantics.
dcterms:title: Reversing Petri Nets (RPNs)

dcterms:creator: K. Jensen
L. M. Kristensen
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a comprehensive framework for modeling and validating concurrent systems using Coloured Petri Nets (CPNs).
dcterms:title: Coloured Petri Nets (CPNs)

dcterms:creator: A. V. Ratzer
L. Wells
H. M. Lassen
M. Laursen
J. F. Qvortrup
M. Stissing
S. Westergaard
K. Christensen
K. Jensen
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes tools for editing, simulating, and analyzing coloured Petri nets, facilitating the study of their properties and behaviors.
dcterms:title: CPN Tools

dcterms:creator: A. Philippou
K. Psara
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the concept of reversible computation within the framework of Petri nets, providing insights into their operational semantics.
dcterms:title: Reversible Computation in Petri Nets

dcterms:creator: A. Philippou
K. Psara
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates reversible computation specifically in cyclic Petri nets, contributing to the understanding of their computational capabilities.
dcterms:title: Reversible Computation in Cyclic Petri Nets
